channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLscienceAndDiscovery, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Something was pumping enormous energy into a young galaxy cluster
item.description: Scientists have detected a surprisingly hot galaxy cluster dating back to the universe’s infancy. The cluster formed far earlier and burned far hotter...

item.title: Scientists find exercise rivals therapy for depression

item.title: This brain trick makes exercise feel easier

item.title: Just 10 minutes of exercise can trigger powerful anti-cancer effects
item.description: A brief, intense workout may do more than boost fitness—it could help fight cancer. Researchers found that just 10 minutes of hard exercise releases m...

item.title: A new study casts doubt on life beneath Europa’s ice
item.description: Europa’s buried ocean has made it one of the most exciting places to search for life beyond Earth. However, new calculations suggest its seafloor may ...
